analysis.key_quote: If I was a federal employee I would be very much less likely to report fraud or wrong doing in the government. This is because schedule F would strip me of all the protections that I would of had otherwise.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that Schedule F would remove protections for federal employees, leading to a fear of reporting misconduct. This indicates opposition to the rule, as it highlights the importance of due process and employee rights.
